com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast

Interface InterestBroadcaster<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of syntax unit to collect.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Broadcaster
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SingleInterestBroadcaster, TypeInterestBroadcaster

    public interface InterestBroadcaster<T>
extends Broadcaster
    A broadcaster similar to QueryableBroadcaster, but it only stores references of a single type.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Iterable<T> gather()
      Gets all units of the expected type that were broadcasted.
      Optional<T> one()
      Gets the first or only unit of the expected type to be broadcast, if present.
      InterestBroadcaster<T> reset()
      Clears all stored units that matched the expected type.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast.Broadcaster

        broadcast, chain, chainBroadcast, cut

    • Method Detail

      • one

        Optional<T> one()
        Gets the first or only unit of the expected type to be broadcast, if present.
        Returns:
        The first or only instance, or an empty Optional if not present.

      • gather

        Iterable<T> gather()
        Gets all units of the expected type that were broadcasted.
        Returns:
        All units of the expected type.

      • reset

        InterestBroadcaster<T> reset()
        Clears all stored units that matched the expected type.
        Returns:
        this, for chaining.
